name: Power Boat Simulator 3D
description:
Real power boat stunt racing mania is the most popular game for the boat racing lover. This extreme best boat racing game is specially designed to develop your boat riding skills on blue sea water. If you really love boat racing game with crazy stunts then this brand new real power boat stunt racing simulator is specially for you. Drive your super speed boat on huge oceanic water and prove that you are the professional boat rider and real power boat surfer
Features:
• Easy and Fun to Play
• Beautiful and amazing 3D environment
• Superb Jet Ski Driving Physics
• Multiple stunning Levels Contains different challenge
• Awesome 3D Graphic effects
• Wonderful sound Effects
• Realistic and Very smooth Jet Ski control
